channel.title: How to make quests
channel.description: How do i make quests on a 317 server. I'm working on coding all the quests in that are on runescape but i have no idea how to do it and would really like to learn how.

item.title: How to make quests

item.description:

i want to make a quest where like say cook’s assistant you have to get the milk and stuff but i don’t know how to make it so when you talk to the cook 1. he assigns the quest 2. the quest turns yellow then green when finished 3.how to make the rewards

Read full topic
